column3: “Pleasant high. a creeper. i smoked a couple hours ago and i am still very, very high . it takes about 30-35 minutes to fully kick in, and about 4 hours before the high gradually starts to fade off.  the buds are wider at the top similar to jack herrer, except they are not quite as big and more resinous. it looks like it was dipped in resin. the bud is covered in dark orange hairs that are well trimmed. the stem has a...”
“Great lasting high. Solid high for about 3 hrs then slowly fades. Perfect for the outdoors”

“Oh fn snap.   This shit  is straight 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥- I put an orange peel in the packet to keep us extra dope dank.  Gyrations to roll up into Death Star hits which are also known as Vader Bombs. This stuff is super danky dope.   Got high af and enjoyed it.   Put some into some cookies stud and shit is bank 🔥”
“Top 10 favorite strains. Highly recommended. The taste and the effects of this strain are desirably potent. The budding itself is sticky and has a Fruit-Loops" Aroma about it. Enjoy Lads.”"
“Got a batch from Cali. Some awesome buds, looks good. Personal preference was with a tobacco pipe. Great taste and a great buzz.”

“I just picked up a quad in ft Collins, this stuff is one of my favorite scents, super fruity but has a wonderful undertone of skunk that really brings it all together, it's definitely a stronger strain, but there was way more room for kief on those leaves”

“it smelled AMAZING! (like fruity candles)
LOVE IT(:”
“Pretty good Sativa, very dense buds. Sweet scent with a mellow taste. Got me feeling happy and euphoric with a few hits. Dont need much to enjoy the high, i would buy this again.”
“as i'm writing this shiz, i want you to know i'm 100% skeed and ready to smoke my second tropical tang blunt. it's got my body feelin nice af and my girls lookin hella good. yeet”

“Great strain, very chill, but not tiring unless you hit it a bunch or are already very tired.  Interesting taste, not full of citrus flavor but a definite flavor, and also very smooth.  Great for a nice relaxing day.”

“This strain has quickly joined the ranks of my favorite strains. A very happy feeling and mood lifter. Great for gaming and reading as well. The aroma of the buds is very potent and would love to see this strain featured as an oil cartridge.”
“just picked up and i am definitely satisfied. way better than that white elephant i had yesterday.Phenomenal high,taste great gorgeous color what more can I ask for.”
“Absolute fire this strain. Sweet flavour with a smooth smoke to it. One of my favourites from chronickushco.ca no one beats their quality and service”
